title: Coconut chocolate cake
ingredients: ['250g plain flour', '300g caster sugar', '3/4 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '3/4 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '100g margarine', '90g cooking chocolate, melted', '225ml buttermilk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 eggs', '75g desiccated coconut']
